name: Above Snakes: Prologue
description:
In Above Snakes: Prologue you play the beginning of Above Snakes and get a feel for what the game plays like.

Survival with a Twist


In contrast to other survival games, the world is not generated procedurally. Instead, generate it yourself by placing isometric tile world pieces! Start your journey in the small lumberjack settlement of Hunter's Rest and begin crafting the world around you!

Create and Survive


Determine the landscape of this world inspired by the Wild West and dictate how it will unfold before you. You have the power to decide what’s next.

Craft, Cook, Hunt, and Fish


To help the people of Hunter's Rest, you can craft necessary tools from newly discovered resources. Advance in leather working, cloth weaving, and more professions to create the best survival supplies for your adventure!

Base Building


Invest your resources into your very own cabin and establish a base for defense and shelter.

Key Features

  • An immersive prologue about an apocalyptic event in a fictional version of the Wild West
  • An isometric world made of world pieces, created by the player throughout their journey
  • Craft, farm, hunt, fish, build bases, and fight in order to stay alive
  • Deep base building system with extensive outdoor and indoor assets
  • Complete quests at your own pace and unravel the secrets of Above Snakes

Accessibility

Full controller support, key and button rebinding, disable camera shake, disable smooth camera movements, photosensitive mode, custom volume controls for sfx, music, eating noises, and footsteps.
